column4: i am using ubuntu (XFCE) on netbook with the typically small screen (1024x600), and evolution is just unusable here
why is it the default email client?
practically every dialog is too large in height
and there are no scrollbars
it is only soso usable using Alt+dragging
that is a longstanding bug, bug 8629 and various re-reports of it
the default email client is now thunderbird
ahh k :D nice, and thanks
will use thunderbird too then

it is actually probably quite easy to fix, I looked into it ages and ages ago, there is a wizard class somewhere that has a fixed height and it throws everything out and doesn't rescale and grow scrollbars.
mmm ok :-)
they lazy?
no, they just have bigger screens than you :)
i mean.. netbook users are.. many, these days
anyone can fix it, if motivated to do so
an email client just cant afford to ignore that
yeah.. ;-)
if it would be java, i'd do it
